answer: Tooth extraction: use code 8201. Usually 1 unit per tooth. Check for medical necessity exceptions.
Crowns are billed using code 456. Typically approved once every 5 years unless medically justified.
Root canal therapy is billed under codes 700-702 depending on tooth type. Pre-authorisation may be required.
Replacement crowns require documentation of failure; approval varies by case â€” attach supporting notes.
Approved quantity refers to the amount the payer will approve; check the policy's limits per code.
